department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
Alaric started working under the name of Blue Bassoon Pictures in 1999. His work includes, short films, documentaries, music videos, corporate videos, weddings, events, demo reels, head shots, commercials, news stories and more. 

His work has been screened at many film festivals in the Midwest including the Chicago International Film Festival, the Illinois International Film Festival the Chicago International REEL Shorts Film Festival and more. His clients include the University of Illinois, Millennium Park Chicago, Cook County Jail, Educational Insights and more. Alaric has taught at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago, Lillstreet Art Center, the City of Evanston and Richland Community College. You can also find him on the Internet Movie Database, You Tube, Myspace and facebook. Alaric is available for hire as a director of photography, assistant camera, director and movie making instructor.
